Healing Spirit.name: Healing Spirit
Healing Spirit.flavor: You call to the spirits on behalf of a wounded ally, closing wounds and filling your ally with vigor.
Healing Spirit.target: You or one ally in the burst
Healing Spirit.effect:
The target can spend a healing surge. If the target does so, one ally adjacent to your spirit companion, other than the target, regains 1d6 hit points.
Level 6: 2d6 hit points.
Level 11: 3d6 hit points.
Level 16: 4d6 hit points.
Level 21: 5d6 hit points.
Level 26: 6d6 hit points.
Healing Spirit.special: You can use this power twice per encounter, but only once per round. At 16th level, you can use this power three times per encounter, but only once per round.

Speak with Spirits.name: Speak with Spirits
Speak with Spirits.flavor: You commune with the spirits, letting them guide your words and actions.
Speak with Spirits.effect: During this turn, you gain a bonus to your next skill check equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Watcher's Strike.name: Watcher's Strike
Watcher's Strike.flavor: Your spirit companion harries your enemies, distracting them and giving you openings for your attacks. You and your allies can also draw on the spirit’s heightened senses for a moment.
Watcher's Strike.onHit:
1d8 + Wisdom modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, you and your allies gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls and a +5 bonus to Perception checks while adjacent to your spirit companion.
Level 21: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier damage.

Defending Strike.name: Defending Strike
Defending Strike.flavor: Your spirit companion strikes a foe, drawing energy from the enemy and turning that energy into a protective shield.
Defending Strike.onHit:
1d8 + Wisdom modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, you and your allies gain a +1 power bonus to AC while adjacent to your spirit companion.
Level 21: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier damage.

Twin Panthers.name: Twin Panthers
Twin Panthers.flavor: Two panther spirits leap on your foes, and the panthers channel their predatory instincts through your spirit companion so that it menaces nearby enemies.
Twin Panthers.stalkerSpirit: If the target is bloodied, you gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to your Intelligence modifier.
Twin Panthers.onHit: 1d8 + Wisdom modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, you and your allies have combat advantage when making melee attacks against any enemy adjacent to your spirit companion.
Twin Panthers.effect: Make the attack one more time against the same target or a different one.

Call to the Ancient Defender.name: Call to the Ancient Defender
Call to the Ancient Defender.flavor: Your spirit companion channels the spirit of an ancestral warrior, which helps your spirit companion cover your allies’ retreat.
Call to the Ancient Defender.onHit: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, you and your allies gain a +5 bonus to all defenses against opportunity attacks while adjacent to your spirit companion.

Call to the Ancestral Warrior.name: Call to the Ancestral Warrior
Call to the Ancestral Warrior.flavor: Your spirit companion channels a mighty ancestor spirit as it attacks your foe and bolsters your allies’ defenses.
Call to the Ancestral Warrior.onHit: 1d10 + Wisdom modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, you and your allies gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses while adjacent to your spirit companion.

Call to the Savage Elder.name: Call to the Savage Elder
Call to the Savage Elder.flavor: Your spirit companion lashes out in a savage attack, filling your allies with ferocity.
Call to the Savage Elder.onHit: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, any ally adjacent to your spirit companion gains a power bonus to the damage rolls of melee attacks equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Rimefire Spirit.name: Rimefire Spirit
Rimefire Spirit.flavor: A spirit of ice and flame freezes and burns your foe, and the spirit’s energies emanate from your spirit companion, making nearby enemies vulnerable to further attacks.
Rimefire Spirit.onHit: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier cold and fire damage. Until the end of your next turn, any enemy adjacent to your spirit companion gains vulnerable 5 cold and vulnerable 5 fire.

Call to the Howling Storm.name: Call to the Howling Storm
Call to the Howling Storm.flavor: Your spirit companion takes on an aspect of howling winds and lightning to strike at your enemy while whirling a nearby ally into a better position.
Call to the Howling Storm.onHit: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier lightning and thunder damage, and one ally adjacent to your spirit companion can shift 5 squares as a free action.

Call to the Blood Dancer.name: Call to the Blood Dancer
Call to the Blood Dancer.flavor: A vicious spirit of blood and wrath infuses your spirit companion, which howls in fury as it slashes your foe with claws and fangs.
Call to the Blood Dancer.onHit: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, any ally can score a critical hit on a roll of 18–20 while adjacent to your spirit companion.
Call to the Blood Dancer.stalkerSpirit: Until the end of your next turn, any ally gains a bonus to damage rolls equal to your Intelligence modifier while adjacent to your spirit companion.

Spirit of Cleansing Light.name: Spirit of Cleansing Light
Spirit of Cleansing Light.flavor: A swirling mote of shining light sears your foes, then channels healing power through your spirit companion, driving ill effects from one of your allies.
Spirit of Cleansing Light.onHit: 3d6 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and one ally adjacent to your spirit companion makes a saving throw with a +2 bonus.

Shackles of the Mountain.name: Shackles of the Mountain
Shackles of the Mountain.flavor: Two spirits—humanoid forms of granite—appear and batter your foes. They then channel power through your spirit companion to weaken the defenses of nearby enemies.
Shackles of the Mountain.onHit: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, any enemy uses the lower of its AC and Reflex as its AC while adjacent to your spirit companion.
Shackles of the Mountain.stalkerSpirit: The enemy instead uses the lowest of its AC, Fortitude, and Reflex as its AC.

Spirit of Spring's Renewal.name: Spirit of Spring's Renewal
Spirit of Spring's Renewal.flavor: A humanoid spirit formed of bark, vines, and roots appears and slams your enemy. Channeling power through your spirit companion, the spirit renews your allies’ strength.
Spirit of Spring's Renewal.onHit: 3d6 + Wisdom modifier damage, and each ally adjacent to your spirit companion can spend a healing surge.
Spirit of Spring's Renewal.protectorSpirit: Each of the allies who spends a healing surge regains additional hit points equal to twice your Constitution modifier.

Spirit of the Death Raven.name: Spirit of the Death Raven
Spirit of the Death Raven.flavor: A black bird swoops over your foe—a sign of ill omen, signifying that your enemy’s death is at hand.
Spirit of the Death Raven.onHit: 4d8 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage. Before the end of your next turn, you roll a d20 the next time the target is hit by an attack that isn’t a critical hit. If you roll 15 or higher, that attack becomes a critical hit.

Twin Tempest Spirits.name: Twin Tempest Spirits
Twin Tempest Spirits.flavor: Shrieking bird spirits of thunder and lightning descend on your foes, battering them as the planar winds from the spirits’ wings flow through your spirit companion, allowing your allies to teleport.
Twin Tempest Spirits.onHit: 3d10 + Wisdom modifier lightning and thunder damage. If either attack hits, you can teleport each ally adjacent to your spirit companion 10 squares.

Spirit of Elder Wisdom.name: Spirit of Elder Wisdom
Spirit of Elder Wisdom.flavor: A spirit elder clad in robes and bearing a staff appears next to your foe. Lightning arcs from the spirit’s hands to shock that foe. The spirit lends counsel to your allies, ensuring that their efforts are not wasted.
Spirit of Elder Wisdom.onHit: 3d8 + Wisdom modifier lightning damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn. Any ally adjacent to your spirit companion who doesn't hit with an encounter attack power before the end of your next turn does not expend the use of that power.

Blood Reaper Spirit.name: Blood Reaper Spirit
Blood Reaper Spirit.flavor: Shrieking falcons with red feathers circle your foes, slashing at them with knifelike talons. Once the falcons have tasted blood, they channel their strength through your spirit companion to your allies.
Blood Reaper Spirit.onHit: 4d6 + Wisdom modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, any ally gains a +2 bonus to damage rolls while adjacent to your spirit companion.
Blood Reaper Spirit.effect: Make the attack two more times against the same target or different ones. The bonus to your allies’ damage rolls increases to +4 if the attack hits twice and +6 if it hits three times.
Blood Reaper Spirit.stalkerSpirit: Your Intelligence modifier is added to the bonus to damage rolls.

Spirit of Life.name: Spirit of Life
Spirit of Life.flavor: The spirit of a golden owl alights on your ally’s shoulder and flutters off, carrying with it that friend’s aches and wounds.
Spirit of Life.effect: The target regains hit points as if he or she had spent a healing surge.

Spirit Binding.name: Spirit Binding
Spirit Binding.flavor: You weave primal forces to strengthen the bond between your spirit companion and another spirit it is channeling, allowing the connection to linger for a moment longer.
Spirit Binding.effect: If your spirit companion is granting any benefits until the end of this turn to allies adjacent to it, the benefits instead last until the end of your next turn.

Bonds of the Clan.name: Bonds of the Clan
Bonds of the Clan.flavor: You take on a portion of your ally’s injury.
Bonds of the Clan.trigger: An ally within 10 squares of you takes damage
Bonds of the Clan.effect: You and the target each take half of the damage.

Sudden Restoration.name: Sudden Restoration
Sudden Restoration.flavor: Primal energy surges into your allies to drive away harmful effects.
Sudden Restoration.effect: Each target makes a saving throw.

Blessing of the Iron Tree.name: Blessing of the Iron Tree
Blessing of the Iron Tree.flavor: You invoke the spirit of the legendary tree of iron to grant your ally the endurance needed to survive.
Blessing of the Iron Tree.target: One bloodied ally in the burst
Blessing of the Iron Tree.effect: The target gains resist 5 to all damage until the end of the encounter.

Spirit Call.name: Spirit Call
Spirit Call.flavor: You whisper words of ancient power, causing your guardian spirits to move as you command.
Spirit Call.target: Each of your shaman conjurations and zones in the burst

Spirit Summons.name: Spirit Summons
Spirit Summons.flavor: You send forth a call into the spirit world and summon a second companion to guide your way.
Spirit Summons.effect:
Until the end of the encounter, you can use your call
spirit companion power to conjure a second spirit companion.
When you attack with a spirit power, you choose which spirit companion to use for the attack. When an effect applies to creatures adjacent to your spirit companion, that effect applies to creatures adjacent to both spirit companions. The second spirit companion disappears at the end of the encounter.

Spirit of the Keeper.name: Spirit of the Keeper
Spirit of the Keeper.flavor: A protective ancestor spirit appears and lays a healing hand on your ally. The spirit’s warding power flows into your spirit companion, helping it defend your allies from attack.
Spirit of the Keeper.effect: The target can spend a healing surge and regain 1d6 additional hit points. Until the end of the encounter, any ally adjacent to your spirit companion doesn’t grant combat advantage.

Forge the Chains of Life.name: Forge the Chains of Life
Forge the Chains of Life.flavor: As you feel an ally’s spirit begin to slip away, you shout a word of command that fills that ally with new life.
Forge the Chains of Life.trigger: An ally within 10 squares of you fails a death saving throw
Forge the Chains of Life.target: The triggering ally in the burst
Forge the Chains of Life.effect: The target regains hit points equal to his or her bloodied value.

Call the Dead.name: Call the Dead
Call the Dead.flavor: You reach into the spirit world and grasp your allies’ fleeing souls, returning them to their bodies so that they can fight on.
Call the Dead.target: Each dead ally in the burst
Call the Dead.effect: Each target returns to life and spends a healing surge. Each target is also considered to have failed no death saving throws during this encounter.

Bounty of Life.name: Bounty of Life
Bounty of Life.flavor: You tap into the flow of primal energy and send vigor into your allies, allowing even the most grievous injury to knit in an instant.
Bounty of Life.effect: Each target gains regeneration 5 until the end of the encounter. The regeneration increases to 10 while a target is bloodied.

Spirit of the World Healer.name: Spirit of the World Healer
Spirit of the World Healer.flavor: You call on the spirit of the World Healer—the force that mended the world after the great war between the gods and the primordials—to tend to a wounded comrade.
Spirit of the World Healer.effect: The target regains all its hit points.

Raging Storm Spirit.name: Raging Storm Spirit
Raging Storm Spirit.flavor: With a peal of thunder, a storm cloud laden with dancing bolts of lightning appears and lashes out at your foe, then lingers to empower the attacks of your allies.
Raging Storm Spirit.effect: The burst creates a zone of thunder that lasts until the end of the encounter. Any ally deals 1d6 extra thunder damage when he or she hits an enemy that is within the zone.

Blessing of the Seven Winds.name: Blessing of the Seven Winds
Blessing of the Seven Winds.flavor: You call on the spirits of the seven winds. They roar over the battlefield, knocking aside a foe and sending other enemies sprawling.
Blessing of the Seven Winds.onHit: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier damage, and you slide the target 2 squares.
Blessing of the Seven Winds.effect: The attack creates a zone of swirling winds in a burst 1 centered on the target. The zone lasts until the end of the encounter. As a move action, you can move the zone 5 squares. As a minor action, you can slide each creature within the zone 1 square.

Spirit of the Shielding Fire.name: Spirit of the Shielding Fire
Spirit of the Shielding Fire.flavor: A spirit of flame shields your ally from harm, lashing out at your command when the ally comes under attack.
Spirit of the Shielding Fire.effect: The primary target gains 10 temporary hit points. Until the end of the encounter, the primary target gains resist 5 fire, and you can use the Spirit of the Shielding Fire Attack power.
Spirit of the Shielding Fire.requirement: The Spirit of the Shielding Fire power must be active to use this power.
Spirit of the Shielding Fire.trigger: An enemy hits the primary target with a melee attack

Wrath of the Spirit World.name: Wrath of the Spirit World
Wrath of the Spirit World.flavor: Angry spirits lash out at the minds of your foes all around you and your spirit companion.
Wrath of the Spirit World.target: Each enemy in the burst and each enemy adjacent to your spirit companion
Wrath of the Spirit World.onHit: 3d6 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage, and you knock the target prone.

Storm Guardian Spirit.name: Storm Guardian Spirit
Storm Guardian Spirit.flavor: Thunder crashes over your foe as the storm guardian spirit appears. This spectral creature of dark storm clouds then surrounds your ally and avenges attacks against that ally.
Storm Guardian Spirit.effect: Choose an ally within 5 squares of the target. Until the end of the encounter, when any enemy hits that ally, that enemy takes 5 thunder damage and is pushed 1 square from the ally.

Earthrage Spirit.name: Earthrage Spirit
Earthrage Spirit.flavor: The spirit of the great earth serpent rages beneath your enemies, knocking them to the ground and sending minor tremors to topple them for the rest of the battle.
Earthrage Spirit.onHit: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.
Earthrage Spirit.effect: Each target drops prone whenever it is hit by an attack (save ends).

Spirit of the Hawk's Wind.name: Spirit of the Hawk's Wind
Spirit of the Hawk's Wind.flavor: A wind sweeps over the area as a shining hawk spirit swoops down on your foe. As the spirit beats its wings, it creates gusts that lift your allies aloft, allowing them to move in safety.
Spirit of the Hawk's Wind.onHit: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.
Spirit of the Hawk's Wind.effect: The attack creates a zone of uplifting winds in a burst 3 centered on the target. The zone lasts until the end of the encounter. While within the zone, any ally can use a move action to shift 4 squares and ignore difficult terrain during the shift. As a move action, you can move the zone 5 squares.

Clever Trickster Spirit.name: Clever Trickster Spirit
Clever Trickster Spirit.flavor: An ephemeral creature of stealth, cunning, and deception leaps on your foe, attacking that enemy and keeping it off balance. When your enemy finally shakes the spirit off, the spirit moves on to bedevil another foe.
Clever Trickster Spirit.effect: The target is slowed and grants combat advantage (save ends both).
Clever Trickster Spirit.aftereffect: The enemy nearest to the target is slowed and grants combat advantage (save ends both).

Spirit of Autumn's Reaping.name: Spirit of Autumn's Reaping
Spirit of Autumn's Reaping.flavor: A spirit of a robed figure swings its scythe to harvest the enemy’s life, using that energy to heal you and your allies.
Spirit of Autumn's Reaping.onHit: 3d6 + Wisdom modifier necrotic damage, and the target gains vulnerable 5 to all damage (save ends).
Spirit of Autumn's Reaping.onMiss: Half damage, and the target gains vulnerable 2 to all damage (save ends).
Spirit of Autumn's Reaping.effect: You and each ally within 10 squares of you regain 5 hit points.

Cleansing Wind of the North.name: Cleansing Wind of the North
Cleansing Wind of the North.flavor: You call on the spirits of the frigid north to bite into your enemies and to carry away your allies’ ills.
Cleansing Wind of the North.effect: Each ally in the blast makes a saving throw with a +5 power bonus.

Death Spirit.name: Death Spirit
Death Spirit.flavor: Time seems to freeze for a moment as everything goes quiet. Death itself, the ender of all things, has entered the fray, wracking your foe with pain that only intensifies as others fall.
Death Spirit.effect: When any creature drops to 0 hit points or fewer within 10 squares of the target, the target takes 3d10 necrotic damage (save ends).
Death Spirit.aftereffect: When any creature drops to 0 hit points or fewer within 10 squares of the target, the target takes 2d10 necrotic damage (save ends).

Searing Wind of the South.name: Searing Wind of the South
Searing Wind of the South.flavor: The first wind of the south blew through a trackless desert, scattering sand and gusting with bone-charring heat. Its spirit still races across the world, and you call it forth to aid you in battle.
Searing Wind of the South.effect: You slide each ally in the blast to another space in or adjacent to the blast.

Guardian of the Primal Copse.name: Guardian of the Primal Copse
Guardian of the Primal Copse.flavor: A spirit of the forest smashes your enemy with its mighty branches. For the moment, your foe’s defenses are only as strong as the weakest.
Guardian of the Primal Copse.effect: After the attack, the target’s defenses all equal the lowest of its defenses (save ends).

Spirit of the Wolf Pack.name: Spirit of the Wolf Pack
Spirit of the Wolf Pack.flavor: A great howl sweeps over the battle as a pack of spectral wolves bound from the spirit world to attack your foes.
Spirit of the Wolf Pack.effect: The target grants combat advantage, and an attack deals 1d6 extra damage to the target on a hit if the attacker is flanking the target (save ends both).

Tendrils of the Fate Weaver.name: Tendrils of the Fate Weaver
Tendrils of the Fate Weaver.flavor: You call on the spirit of the Fate Weaver, a great spider said to have created the bindings between the planes, to wrap your foe in rock-hard spiderwebs and to protect your friend.
Tendrils of the Fate Weaver.onHit: 4d10 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is slowed and can’t gain combat advantage against any target (save ends both). The target takes a -5 penalty to saving throws against this effect.
Tendrils of the Fate Weaver.effect: Choose an ally within 10 squares of you. Until the end of the encounter, if any enemy hits that ally, that enemy is immobilized until the end of its next turn.

Spirit of the Shield Breaker.name: Spirit of the Shield Breaker
Spirit of the Shield Breaker.flavor: A howling warrior bearing a greataxe leaps on your foe, shattering its defenses and urging your allies to greater glory.
Spirit of the Shield Breaker.onHit: 3d12 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target takes a -4 penalty to AC (save ends).
Spirit of the Shield Breaker.aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to AC (save ends).
Spirit of the Shield Breaker.onMiss: Half damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to AC (save ends).
Spirit of the Shield Breaker.effect: You conjure the spirit of the shield breaker in a square adjacent to the target. The spirit lasts until the end of the encounter. As a move action, you can move the spirit 5 squares. While adjacent to the spirit or in its space, you and your allies gain a +5 power bonus to damage rolls.

Great Bear Guardian.name: Great Bear Guardian
Great Bear Guardian.flavor: A bear spirit appears amid your foes. It knocks one enemy aside and stands alert, ready to protect you and your allies with its vicious claws.
Great Bear Guardian.onHit: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier damage, and you push the target 2 squares and knock it prone.
Great Bear Guardian.onMiss: Half damage, and you push the target 1 square.
Great Bear Guardian.effect:
You conjure a bear spirit in an unoccupied square adjacent to the target. The spirit lasts until the end of the encounter. The spirit occupies 1 square. Enemies cannot move through its space, but allies can. As a move action, you can move the spirit 5 squares.
    The spirit can flank enemies with you and your allies, and it can make opportunity attacks against your enemies: Wisdom vs. Reflex; 2d10 + your Wisdom modifier damage.

Ironborn Spirit.name: Ironborn Spirit
Ironborn Spirit.flavor: A spirit of iron impales your foe with an iron spike, then creates an area where your allies can stand fast.
Ironborn Spirit.onHit: 3d10 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).
Ironborn Spirit.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Ironborn Spirit.effect: The attack creates a zone that is a burst 5 centered on the target. The zone lasts until the end of the encounter. While within the zone, any ally gains a +2 power bonus to AC and can negate being pulled, pushed, or slid.

Spirit of the World Serpent.name: Spirit of the World Serpent
Spirit of the World Serpent.flavor: The spirit of the World Serpent emerges from the ground to pierce your foe with its fangs, pinning the foe to the ground. Tremors from the spirit’s movement shake the ground.
Spirit of the World Serpent.onHit: 5d8 + Wisdom modifier damage, and you knock the target prone. Whenever the target stands up, it takes 15 damage (save ends).
Spirit of the World Serpent.aftereffect: Whenever the target stands up, it takes 5 damage (save ends).
Spirit of the World Serpent.onMiss: Half damage. Whenever the target stands up, it takes 10 damage (save ends).
Spirit of the World Serpent.effect: At the start of the target’s turn, it and any enemy within 3 squares of it are knocked prone (save ends).

Western Wind of Storms.name: Western Wind of Storms
Western Wind of Storms.flavor: You call on the spirit of the stormy western wind to hurl your enemies away, spinning them through the planar firmament and whisking your allies to safety.
Western Wind of Storms.onHit: 3d6 + Wisdom modifier lightning damage, and you teleport the target 10 squares.
Western Wind of Storms.onMiss: Half damage, and you teleport the target 5 squares.
Western Wind of Storms.effect: You teleport each ally in the blast 10 squares.

Spirit of the Laughing Wanderer.name: Spirit of the Laughing Wanderer
Spirit of the Laughing Wanderer.flavor: A spirit like a hyena appears and savages your foe’s mind, barking its eerie cackle. Its laugh continues to dumbfound your enemy as it moves to a different foe.
Spirit of the Laughing Wanderer.onHit: 3d10 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage, and the target is stunned (save ends).
Spirit of the Laughing Wanderer.aftereffect: The enemy nearest to the target is dazed and slowed (save ends both).
Spirit of the Laughing Wanderer.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is dazed and slowed (save ends both).

Spirit of the Unbroken Vow.name: Spirit of the Unbroken Vow
Spirit of the Unbroken Vow.flavor: At the end of the war between the gods and the primordials, the primal forces forged a sacred compact that established the laws of nature. As you call on the power of that compact to ravage your foe, your ally swears an oath to slay your enemy.
Spirit of the Unbroken Vow.effect: Choose an ally within 10 squares of you. Until the end of the encounter, that ally gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls against the target. Whenever the ally damages the target, this bonus increases by 1 to a maximum of +10. If the ally doesn’t attack the target during his or her turn, the bonus decreases by 2 to a minimum of +0.

Haunting Spirits.name: Haunting Spirits
Haunting Spirits.flavor: Howling spirits appear around your foe, distracting it from your ally’s attack.
Haunting Spirits.onHit:
1d6 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target grants combat advantage to an ally of your choice.
Level 21: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage.

Spirit's Fangs.name: Spirit's Fangs
Spirit's Fangs.flavor: When an enemy drops its guard, your spirit companion leaps on it, claws and fangs bared.
Spirit's Fangs.trigger: An enemy leaves a square adjacent to your spirit companion without shifting
Spirit's Fangs.onHit:
1d10 + Wisdom modifier damage.
Level 21: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier damage.

Spirit's Shield.name: Spirit's Shield
Spirit's Shield.flavor: Your spirit companion bats at a foe that drops its guard, and a nearby ally draws healing energy from the spirit.
Spirit's Shield.trigger: An enemy leaves a square adjacent to your spirit companion without shifting
Spirit's Shield.effect: One ally within 5 squares of your spirit companion regains hit points equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Wrath of Winter.name: Wrath of Winter
Wrath of Winter.flavor: Winter spirits surround your enemy, ripping into it with spectral fangs and claws and calling your spirit companion to join the fray.
Wrath of Winter.onHit:
1d10 + Wisdom modifier cold damage. You can teleport your spirit companion to a space adjacent to the target.
Level 21: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier cold damage.

Thunder Bear's Warding.name: Thunder Bear's Warding
Thunder Bear's Warding.flavor: An ancient bear spirit roars with thunder and channels its strength through your spirit companion to bolster your allies.
Thunder Bear's Warding.onHit: 1d6 + Wisdom modifier thunder damage. Until the end of your next turn, you and your allies gain resistance to all damage equal to your Constitution modifier while adjacent to your spirit companion.
Thunder Bear's Warding.protectorSpirit: You or an ally within 5 squares of you gains temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier.

Spirit of the Healing Flood.name: Spirit of the Healing Flood
Spirit of the Healing Flood.flavor: The spirit of the great flood appears, a being of storm-tossed water. Its essence sustains your allies and drowns your foes.
Spirit of the Healing Flood.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you and each ally in the burst gain regeneration 2 while bloodied. As a minor action, a character can end this effect on himself or herself to regain 10 hit points.

Spirits of Battle.name: Spirits of Battle
Spirits of Battle.flavor: You invoke ancestral spirits of battle. Under their shadow, your allies fight with greater might.
Spirits of Battle.effect: The burst creates a zone filled with ancestral spirits that lasts until the end of the encounter. While within the zone, your allies gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls.

Lightning Panther Spirit.name: Lightning Panther Spirit
Lightning Panther Spirit.flavor: With a rumbling growl, a panther spirit appears and strikes your foe with lightning before it vanishes. Your spirit companion channels the panther’s swiftness to your allies.
Lightning Panther Spirit.onHit: 1d10 + Wisdom modifier lightning damage. Until the end of your next turn, any ally adjacent to your spirit companion can shift as a minor action.
Lightning Panther Spirit.stalkerSpirit: Until the end of your next turn, any ally ignores difficult terrain in your spirit companion’s space and in squares adjacent to it.

Spring Renewal Strike.name: Spring Renewal Strike
Spring Renewal Strike.flavor: As your spirit companion attacks your foe, the spirit channels healing power into a nearby ally.
Spring Renewal Strike.onHit: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier damage, and one ally adjacent to your spirit companion can spend a healing surge.
Spring Renewal Strike.protectorSpirit: The ally regains additional hit points equal to your Constitution modifier.

War Chieftain's Blessing.name: War Chieftain's Blessing
War Chieftain's Blessing.flavor: The spirit of a regal warrior clad in a chieftain’s robes utters a great battle cry and hews at your foe with an axe. Your allies, heartened by the chieftain’s efforts, redouble their attacks.
War Chieftain's Blessing.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you and your allies gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls against the target.

Spirit of Dawn.name: Spirit of Dawn
Spirit of Dawn.flavor: A spirit of the sun appears before you, casting a light on your foes that makes it nearly impossible for them to hide from you.
Spirit of Dawn.effect: The burst creates a zone of bright light that lasts until the end of your next turn. You and your allies ignore cover, superior cover, concealment, and total concealment when attacking any enemy that is within the zone. While within the zone, any enemy takes a -5 penalty to Stealth checks.

Thunderstorm Spirit.name: Thunderstorm Spirit
Thunderstorm Spirit.flavor: A storm spirit lashes out at your enemy and then focuses its power around your spirit companion.
Thunderstorm Spirit.onHit: 1d12 + Wisdom modifier lightning and thunder damage. Until the end of your next turn, when you and your allies hit any enemy adjacent to your spirit companion, that enemy takes 1d6 extra lightning and thunder damage.

Winter Wind Spirit.name: Winter Wind Spirit
Winter Wind Spirit.flavor: A whirling spirit of biting winds and driving snow lashes your enemy. Its power funnels through your spirit companion to shield your ally from harm.
Winter Wind Spirit.onHit: 1d10 + Wisdom modifier cold damage. Before the end of your next turn, as an immediate interrupt, you can grant an ally adjacent to your spirit companion a +4 bonus to AC against an attack that hits.
Winter Wind Spirit.protectorSpirit: The bonus to AC equals 3 + your Constitution modifier.

Ancient Warlord's Inspiration.name: Ancient Warlord's Inspiration
Ancient Warlord's Inspiration.flavor: A spectral figure clad in elaborate hide armor appears beside your foe, accompanied by the booming of a distant war horn. The figure swings its club at your enemy and remains to give inspiration to your allies.
Ancient Warlord's Inspiration.effect: You conjure an ancient warlord spirit in an unoccupied square adjacent to the target. The spirit lasts until the end of the encounter. If an ally starts his or her turn adjacent to the spirit or in its space, as an immediate reaction you can allow that ally to make a basic attack as a free action. As a move action, you can move the spirit 5 squares.

Primal Gust.name: Primal Gust
Primal Gust.flavor: A gust moves an ally or an enemy into position.

Rock Shield Spirits.name: Rock Shield Spirits
Rock Shield Spirits.flavor: Spirits of earth rise up to protect your allies.
Rock Shield Spirits.effect: The burst creates a zone filled with rock spirits that lasts until the end of the encounter. While within the zone, any ally gains a +2 power bonus to AC and Fortitude. As a move action, you can move the zone 5 squares.

Spirits of the Shadowed Moon.name: Spirits of the Shadowed Moon
Spirits of the Shadowed Moon.flavor: A spirit of the moon—a creature of mist and shadow—conceals your allies.
Spirits of the Shadowed Moon.effect: The burst creates a zone of glimmering lights and shadows that lasts until the end of the encounter. While within the zone, you and your allies gain concealment and can make Stealth checks to become hidden. As a move action, you can move the zone 5 squares.

Call to the Indomitable Defender.name: Call to the Indomitable Defender
Call to the Indomitable Defender.flavor: Slamming into your opponent, your spirit companion channels a spirit of iron and earth. That spirit’s invulnerability flows through your spirit companion to protect you and your allies.
Call to the Indomitable Defender.onHit: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, you and your allies gain resist 5 to all damage while adjacent to your spirit companion.
Call to the Indomitable Defender.protectorSpirit: The resistance equals 4 + your Constitution modifier.

Call to the Laughing Fortune.name: Call to the Laughing Fortune
Call to the Laughing Fortune.flavor: Your spirit companion channels a spirit of good fortune as it attacks your foe. For a moment, your spirit companion shares the blessing of that spirit with your nearby allies.
Call to the Laughing Fortune.onHit: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier damage. Until the start of your next turn, if an ally adjacent to your spirit companion misses with an attack, you can use an immediate interrupt to allow that ally to reroll the attack.
Call to the Laughing Fortune.stalkerSpirit: The ally gains a bonus to the new attack roll equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Howling Gust.name: Howling Gust
Howling Gust.flavor: A howling spirit of wind appears next to your foe and batters it with a gale, then channels its essence through your spirit companion to whisk a nearby ally across the battlefield.
Howling Gust.onHit: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier damage, and you slide the target 2 squares. You teleport one ally adjacent to your spirit companion 5 squares.

Spirit of the Dancing Zephyr.name: Spirit of the Dancing Zephyr
Spirit of the Dancing Zephyr.flavor: Gentle winds fill the area, giving your allies the agility to spring to a better position after being attacked.
Spirit of the Dancing Zephyr.effect: The burst creates a zone of wind that lasts until the end of the encounter. Whenever you or an ally is hit or missed while within the zone, that character can shift 1 square as an immediate reaction. As a move action, you can move the zone 5 squares.

Call to the Lashing Behemoth.name: Call to the Lashing Behemoth
Call to the Lashing Behemoth.flavor: Your spirit companion channels the spirit of a behemoth with a lashing tail and knocks your foe to the ground. The behemoth spirit then empowers your nearby allies.
Call to the Lashing Behemoth.onHit: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target falls prone. Until the end of your next turn, while adjacent to your spirit companion, any ally can knock a target prone that he or she hits. If the target is already prone, it takes 1d8 extra damage.

Spirit Bond of Vengeance.name: Spirit Bond of Vengeance
Spirit Bond of Vengeance.flavor: Your spirit companion channels a vengeful spirit as it lashes out at a foe. For a short time, the pain of other enemies flows through your companion to wrack that enemy.
Spirit Bond of Vengeance.onHit: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target takes 1d6 damage when any ally hits an enemy, other than the target, that is adjacent to your spirit companion.

Horns of the Undefeated Khan.name: Horns of the Undefeated Khan
Horns of the Undefeated Khan.flavor: Horns sound as the great khan—a champion of the primal forest who has never been defeated in battle—strides from the spirit world to lead your allies into the fray.
Horns of the Undefeated Khan.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you and your allies gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls and a +5 bonus to damage rolls against the target. As a free action before your next turn, each ally within 20 squares of the target can make a saving throw and shift 3 squares as the first action of his or her turn.

Doorway to the Spirit World.name: Doorway to the Spirit World
Doorway to the Spirit World.flavor: The boundaries between the spiritual and the physical waver as you open a doorway to the spirit world to protect your allies from harm.
Doorway to the Spirit World.effect: The burst creates a zone of primal energy that lasts until the end of the encounter. While within the zone, you and your allies are insubstantial.

Call to the Primal Protector.name: Call to the Primal Protector
Call to the Primal Protector.flavor: Your spirit companion briefly appears as a monstrous bear as it mauls your foe. The spirit’s protective power wards your allies from your enemies’ attacks.
Call to the Primal Protector.onHit: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, any ally takes half damage from any source while adjacent to your spirit companion.
Call to the Primal Protector.protectorSpirit: Each ally adjacent to your spirit companion gains temporary hit points equal to 5 + your Constitution modifier.

Call to the Relentless Hunter.name: Call to the Relentless Hunter
Call to the Relentless Hunter.flavor: Your spirit companion is filled with the spirit of the relentless hunter as it ferociously rakes your enemy. For a short time, your allies are filled with a similar ferocity.
Call to the Relentless Hunter.onHit: 4d6 + Wisdom modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, when any ally adjacent to your spirit companion misses with an at-will or an encounter attack power, that attack deals 1d10 damage.
Call to the Relentless Hunter.stalkerSpirit: The damage on an ally’s miss equals 1d10 + your Intelligence modifier.

Call to the Cleansing Fire.name: Call to the Cleansing Fire
Call to the Cleansing Fire.flavor: A mote of white fire emerges from your spirit companion. Its radiance burns an enemy and sweeps away your allies’ ills.
Call to the Cleansing Fire.onHit: 4d8 + Wisdom modifier fire and radiant damage. Until the end of your next turn, each ally gains a +5 bonus to saving throws while adjacent to your spirit companion.
Call to the Cleansing Fire.protectorSpirit: The bonus to saving throws equals 3 + your Constitution modifier.

Call to the Great Hunter.name: Call to the Great Hunter
Call to the Great Hunter.flavor: Your spirit companion is filled with the battle wisdom of the great hunter spirit as it rends your foe and then lends that wisdom to a nearby ally.
Call to the Great Hunter.onHit: 4d8 + Wisdom modifier damage. One ally adjacent to your spirit companion gains a +5 bonus to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Sea of Serpents.name: Sea of Serpents
Sea of Serpents.flavor: A wave of snake spirits surges forth to devour your foes and aid your allies in battle. The serpents impart their agility to your allies, allowing them to attack with lightning speed.
Sea of Serpents.effect: The blast creates a zone of serpent spirits that lasts until the end of the encounter. Any ally that starts his or her turn within the zone gains three benefits until the start of his or her next turn: The ally can shift 3 squares as a minor action, gains combat advantage against each enemy, and can use an opportunity action to make a melee basic attack against any enemy adjacent to him or her that shifts.

Spirits of Mist.name: Spirits of Mist
Spirits of Mist.flavor: You call to the spirits that linger at the edge of the world and maintain the barriers of the planes. The spirits heed your call, smiting your enemies and guarding your allies from attack.
Spirits of Mist.effect: The burst creates a zone of mist that lasts until the end of the encounter. While within the zone, you and your allies are insubstantial. As a move action, you can move the zone 3 squares.

Bramble Ally.name: Bramble Ally
Bramble Ally.flavor: You hurl brambles from the spirit world at your enemy and then cause them to sprout from your spirit companion, limiting the movement of nearby enemies.
Bramble Ally.onHit: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, any enemy that starts its turn adjacent to your spirit companion is slowed during that turn.
Bramble Ally.worldSpeakerSpirit: Any enemy that starts its turn adjacent to your spirit companion is instead immobilized during that turn.

Thorn Ally.name: Thorn Ally
Thorn Ally.flavor: Thorny branches from thickets in the spirit realm erupt from your spirit companion to pierce and entangle your enemy.
Thorn Ally.onHit: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, any enemy that starts its turn adjacent to your spirit companion is restrained until the end of your next turn.

Warthane Ally.name: Warthane Ally
Warthane Ally.flavor: An ancient leader of your people emerges from the spirit realm to strike your enemy, imparting knowledge of your foes’ weaknesses to your spirit companion before returning to its honored place.
Warthane Ally.onHit: 3d8 + Wisdom modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, your allies gain a +5 power bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls with at-will attack powers while adjacent to your spirit companion.

Spirit Hunt.name: Spirit Hunt
Spirit Hunt.flavor: Your spirit companion goes on the hunt, focusing entirely on its prey.
Spirit Hunt.stalkerSpirit: You gain a +2 power bonus to the attack roll if no creatures are within 3 squares of the target.
Spirit Hunt.onHit: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier damage, or 3d10 + Wisdom modifier damage if no creatures are adjacent to the target.

Hunt and Return.name: Hunt and Return
Hunt and Return.flavor: Your spirit companion ranges ahead for a moment, attacking an enemy before retreating toward your allies.
Hunt and Return.stalkerSpirit: You gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll if no creatures are within 3 squares of the target.
Hunt and Return.onHit: 3d8 + Wisdom modifier damage, or 4d8 + Wisdom modifier damage if no creatures are adjacent to the target.
Hunt and Return.effect: After the attack, you can move your spirit companion 4 squares.

Blood-Red Mist.name: Blood-Red Mist
Blood-Red Mist.flavor: As your spirit companion slashes your foe, tendrils of mist pour from the wound, encircling nearby enemies and hampering their attacks.
Blood-Red Mist.onHit: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, enemies take a –2 penalty to all defenses while adjacent to your spirit companion.

Blood-Red Bonds.name: Blood-Red Bonds
Blood-Red Bonds.flavor: Your spirit companion wounds your foe and then ruthlessly pursues your enemies.
Blood-Red Bonds.onHit: 3d8 + Wisdom modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, enemies take a –4 penalty to all defenses while adjacent to your spirit companion. In addition, if an enemy starts its turn adjacent to your spirit companion but does not end that turn adjacent to it, you can use a free action at the end of that turn to move your spirit companion a number of squares equal to your speed to a square that is nearer to that enemy.

Certain Threat.name: Certain Threat
Certain Threat.flavor: With a snarl and a savage lunge, your spirit companion draws and holds the attention of a foe.
Certain Threat.onHit: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is marked by your spirit companion until the end of your next turn or until your spirit companion disappears.
Certain Threat.protectorSpirit: The penalty to attack rolls that the target takes from being marked by this power equals 1 + your Constitution modifier instead of –2.

Drawing All Eyes.name: Drawing All Eyes
Drawing All Eyes.flavor: Your spirit companion’s vicious attack forces your enemy to take notice of it.
Drawing All Eyes.onHit: 4d6 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is marked by your spirit companion until the end of your next turn or until your spirit companion disappears.
Drawing All Eyes.protectorSpirit: The penalty to attack rolls that the target takes from being marked by this power equals your Constitution modifier instead of –2.

Forcing the Threat.name: Forcing the Threat
Forcing the Threat.flavor: Your spirit companion launches a deadly attack, forcing your enemy to pay attention to it or suffer more wounds.
Forcing the Threat.onHit: 4d6 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is marked by your spirit companion until the end of your next turn or until your spirit companion disappears. Until the mark ends, whenever the target makes an attack that doesn’t include your spirit companion as a target, the target takes 2d6 damage.
Forcing the Threat.protectorSpirit: The penalty to attack rolls that the target takes from being marked by this power equals your Constitution modifier instead of –2.

Spirit Lance.name: Spirit Lance
Spirit Lance.flavor: Your spirit companion’s form wavers momentarily as a spear of brilliant energy lances from it toward your enemy.

Flashing Spirit.name: Flashing Spirit
Flashing Spirit.flavor: Your spirit companion darts around the battlefield, looking for opportunities to help your allies deliver deadly attacks.
Flashing Spirit.effect: While any ally is adjacent to your spirit companion, he or she gains a +2 bonus to damage rolls for each enemy you hit with this attack. This effect lasts until the end of your next turn.

Mighty Spirit Leap.name: Mighty Spirit Leap
Mighty Spirit Leap.flavor: Your spirit companion leaps among your enemies and makes furious attacks, which inspire your allies to strike just as viciously.
Mighty Spirit Leap.effect: After each attack roll, you can move your spirit companion a number of squares equal to your speed. Roll a d6 for each target you hit and total the rolls. Until the end of your next turn, your allies gain a bonus to damage rolls equal to the result while adjacent to your spirit companion.
Mighty Spirit Leap.stalkerSpirit: Add your Intelligence modifier to the bonus to damage rolls.

Hungry Spirit.name: Hungry Spirit
Hungry Spirit.flavor: Food for the spirits is sustenance for your friends.
Hungry Spirit.onHit: 3d10 + Wisdom modifier damage. If this attack reduces the target to 0 hit points, an ally adjacent to your spirit companion regains hit points equal to one-half your level + your Wisdom modifier.

Ravenous Spirit.name: Ravenous Spirit
Ravenous Spirit.flavor: Your spirit companion feasts on the enemy, gaining health for your friends.
Ravenous Spirit.onHit: 4d10 + Wisdom modifier damage. If the attack reduces the target to 0 hit points, you and your allies regain hit points equal to one-half your level + your Wisdom modifier if adjacent to your spirit companion.

Spirit Cascade.name: Spirit Cascade
Spirit Cascade.flavor: You summon the spirit of mountain headwaters to repeatedly cascade against enemies that approach your spirit companion.
Spirit Cascade.effect: The first time any ally hits an enemy adjacent to your spirit companion, the attack deals 1d6 extra damage to that enemy. The second time any ally hits an enemy adjacent to your spirit companion, the attack deals 2d6 extra damage to that enemy. The third time any ally hits an enemy adjacent to your spirit companion, the attack deals 3d6 extra damage to that enemy. This effect ends after the third attack hits or at the end of the encounter.

Spirit Ocean.name: Spirit Ocean
Spirit Ocean.flavor: You call the powerful spirit of the Primal Ocean, which crashes into your enemy before flowing into your spirit companion to yield its strength to your allies.
Spirit Ocean.effect: The first time any ally hits an enemy adjacent to your spirit companion, the attack deals 1d10 extra damage to that enemy. The second time any ally hits an enemy adjacent to your spirit companion, the attack deals 2d10 extra damage to that enemy. The third time any ally hits an enemy adjacent to your spirit companion, the attack deals 3d10 extra damage to that enemy. This effect ends after the third attack hits an enemy adjacent to your spirit companion or at the end of the encounter.

Spirit Torrent.name: Spirit Torrent
Spirit Torrent.flavor: With the sound of crashing waves, a great spirit rains blows on your enemy, then recedes within your spirit companion, where it waits to help your allies batter your foes again.
Spirit Torrent.effect: The first time any ally hits an enemy adjacent to your spirit companion, the attack deals 1d12 extra damage to that enemy. The second time any ally hits an enemy adjacent to your spirit companion, the attack deals 2d12 extra damage to that enemy. The third time any ally hits an enemy adjacent to your spirit companion, the attack deals 3d12 extra damage to that enemy. This effect ends after the third attack hits or at the end of the encounter.

Wind of Pain and Succor.name: Wind of Pain and Succor
Wind of Pain and Succor.flavor: A wind spirit twines around your spirit companion, allowing it to deliver a chilling strike against your foe or a restorative embrace to an ally.
Wind of Pain and Succor.effect: The first ally to regain hit points while adjacent to your spirit companion regains 1d8 additional hit points. The second ally to do so regains 2d8 additional hit points, and the third ally to do so regains 3d8 additional hit points. This effect ends after the third ally regains these additional hit points or at the end of the encounter.

Wind of Death and Mercy.name: Wind of Death and Mercy
Wind of Death and Mercy.flavor: Your spirit companion joins with a wind spirit to entwine your enemy in chilly currents. Your allies are then invigorated by this union.
Wind of Death and Mercy.effect: The first ally to regain hit points while adjacent to your spirit companion regains 1d12 additional hit points. The second ally to do so regains 2d12 additional hit points, and the third ally to do so regains 3d12 additional hit points. This effect ends after the third ally regains these additional hit points or at the end of the encounter.

Spirit Realm.name: Spirit Realm
Spirit Realm.flavor: You dissolve your connection to your spirit companion for a short time so that it can infuse itself into the spirits of the area, expanding its influence on the world.
Spirit Realm.special: Your spirit companion must be in the burst.
Spirit Realm.effect: Your spirit companion disappears (if you have multiple spirit companions, they all disappear). The burst creates a zone of spirits that lasts until the end of your next turn. Any effect that refers to being adjacent to or within a certain number of squares of your spirit companion instead applies to targets within the zone. You can’t use call spirit companion while the zone persists.

Guiding Snarl.name: Guiding Snarl
Guiding Snarl.flavor: Your spirit companion feints to put your foe in a better position for your ally’s strike.
Guiding Snarl.trigger: An ally adjacent to your spirit companion misses an enemy with an attack
Guiding Snarl.effect: The target can reroll the attack and gains a power bonus to the attack roll equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Quickening Breeze.name: Quickening Breeze
Quickening Breeze.flavor: You call a gentle wind that surrounds your spirit companion and extends outward to your allies, helping them overcome harmful effects.
Quickening Breeze.effect: The first time any ally fails a saving throw while adjacent to your spirit companion, the ally can reroll the saving throw. The second time any ally fails a saving throw while adjacent to your spirit companion, the ally can reroll the saving throw with a +1 bonus. The third time any ally fails a saving throw while adjacent to your spirit companion, the ally can reroll the saving throw with a +2 bonus. This effect ends after the third rerolled saving throw or at the end of the encounter.

Stalker's Strike.name: Stalker's Strike
Stalker's Strike.flavor: As your spirit companion claws at your foe, the spirit is filled with predatory fury, becoming a greater threat to your enemies.
Stalker's Strike.attack: Wisdom vs. Fortitude. If the target is bloodied, you gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to one-half your Intelligence modifier.
Stalker's Strike.onHit:
1d10 + Wisdom modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, your spirit companion can flank with you and your allies.
Level 21: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier damage.

Capturing Jaws.name: Capturing Jaws
Capturing Jaws.flavor: Your spirit companion catches your enemy in its jaws, holding it steady for your allies’ strikes.
Capturing Jaws.onHit: 1d8 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Capturing Jaws.protectorSpirit: Until the end of your next turn, your allies can flank enemies with your spirit companion, and any ally flanking an enemy with your spirit companion gains a bonus to attack rolls against that enemy equal to your Constitution modifier.

Spirits of Mountain Mist.name: Spirits of Mountain Mist
Spirits of Mountain Mist.flavor: A chilling mist streams from your spirit companion, coalescing around your enemies and allowing your allies to attack them more easily.
Spirits of Mountain Mist.onHit: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier cold damage. Until the end of your next turn, any ally who makes an area or a close attack that includes your spirit companion in the area of effect gains a +1 power bonus to the attack rolls of that attack.

Spur the Pack.name: Spur the Pack
Spur the Pack.flavor: Your spirit companion nips at the heels of your allies, motivating them to move in for the kill.
Spur the Pack.target: You and each ally in the burst
Spur the Pack.effect: You slide each target a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Presence of the Ancestor Spirit.name: Presence of the Ancestor Spirit
Presence of the Ancestor Spirit.flavor: You call the spirit of one of your warrior ancestors to merge with an ally, lending its battle knowledge and spiritual protection to your friend.
Presence of the Ancestor Spirit.effect: Until the end of the encounter, the target gains a power bonus to damage rolls equal to your Intelligence modifier. While the target is adjacent to your spirit companion, the power bonus increases by 2. In addition, when any enemy hits the target and deals damage, you can use an immediate interrupt to end this effect and make the attack deal half damage.

Healing Howl.name: Healing Howl
Healing Howl.flavor: Your spirit companion unleashes a howl of courage that bolsters allies near it.
Healing Howl.target: You and each ally in the burst
Healing Howl.effect: Each target regains hit points as if he or she had spent a healing surge. If the burst includes at least three enemies, each target regains additional hit points equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Screening Branches.name: Screening Branches
Screening Branches.flavor: A tangled mass of branches, vines, and leaves provides defense against your enemies’ attacks and soothes your allies’ wounds.
Screening Branches.effect:
You conjure a wall of branches and vines. The wall can be up to 2 squares high and must be on a solid surface, and it lasts until the end of your next turn. The wall provides superior cover, but creatures adjacent to it can make ranged attacks through it without taking the –5 penalty to attack rolls.
Entering a wall square costs 2 extra squares of movement. Any ally adjacent to the wall at the start of his or her turn gains 5 + your Constitution modifier temporary hit points.

Spirit's Regeneration.name: Spirit's Regeneration
Spirit's Regeneration.flavor: A glow of regenerative light surrounds your allies and increases in intensity while they are next to your spirit companion.
Spirit's Regeneration.target: One or two creatures in the burst
Spirit's Regeneration.effect: Until the end of the encounter, each target gains regeneration 5 while bloodied. The regeneration increases to 10 while the target is adjacent to your spirit companion.

Medicines of Many Forms.name: Medicines of Many Forms
Medicines of Many Forms.flavor: You scatter medicinal herbs among your allies, healing body, mind, and spirit.
Medicines of Many Forms.effect: Each target can choose to either make a saving throw, spend a healing surge, or gain 20 temporary hit points.

Natural Rebirth.name: Natural Rebirth
Natural Rebirth.flavor: Sensing an ally about to cross through death’s veil, you call on earth spirits to keep the soul from departing. The spirits restore the ally to health, imbued with primal power.
Natural Rebirth.target: One dying ally in the burst
Natural Rebirth.effect: The target regains hit points as if he or she had spent a healing surge. Until the end of the encounter, the target is immune to effects that immobilize, restrain, or slow.

Spirits of Recovery.name: Spirits of Recovery
Spirits of Recovery.flavor: Luminous spirits of ancestral tribal healers appear around your allies, tending their wounds.
Spirits of Recovery.effect: Each target can make a saving throw against an effect that a save can end. A target who saves gains 1d10 + your Wisdom modifier temporary hit points.

Spray of Quills.name: Spray of Quills
Spray of Quills.flavor: You shoot a barrage of poisonous quills at your foes.
Spray of Quills.onHit: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier damage, and ongoing 5 poison damage (save ends). Until this ongoing damage ends, your allies gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls against the target.

Winds of the Scorching Desert.name: Winds of the Scorching Desert
Winds of the Scorching Desert.flavor: Hot winds sear and scatter your enemies, while you or your spirit companion ride those currents across the battlefield.
Winds of the Scorching Desert.onHit: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier fire damage, and you slide the target a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier.
Winds of the Scorching Desert.onMiss: Half damage, and you slide the target 1 square
Winds of the Scorching Desert.effect: Before or after the attack, you slide yourself or your spirit companion a number of squares equal to your speed.

Reparative Spirit.name: Reparative Spirit
Reparative Spirit.flavor: Working with your allies, your spirit companion lunges in for a vicious attack against your enemy and then lends vigor to a nearby ally.
Reparative Spirit.onHit: 3d8 + Wisdom modifier damage, or 5d8 + Wisdom modifier damage if at least one ally is adjacent to your spirit companion.
Reparative Spirit.effect: At the end of each of your turns until the end of the encounter, one ally adjacent to your spirit companion gains 5 + your Wisdom modifier temporary hit points.

Spirit of the Hunter's Soul.name: Spirit of the Hunter's Soul
Spirit of the Hunter's Soul.flavor: The spirit of a great hunter appears and strikes at your foe with a mighty attack. It then bonds with an ally to continue the onslaught.
Spirit of the Hunter's Soul.effect: Choose an ally within range. That ally gains a +5 power bonus to damage rolls against the target until the end of the encounter. While that ally is adjacent to your spirit companion, add your Intelligence modifier to the power bonus.

Huntmaster's Horn.name: Huntmaster's Horn
Huntmaster's Horn.flavor: The towering spirit of a master of the wild hunt appears above you and blows a horn, shaking your foes’ resolve and calling your allies to battle.
Huntmaster's Horn.onHit: 5d6 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).
Huntmaster's Horn.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).
Huntmaster's Horn.effect: Each ally in the blast gains a power bonus to damage rolls equal to your Intelligence modifier, and creatures that are slowed or immobilized grant combat advantage to them. These effects last until the end of the encounter.

Peacemaker's Lodge.name: Peacemaker's Lodge
Peacemaker's Lodge.flavor: A ring of stone spirits forms in front of you, and a calming haze washes over those inside it.
Peacemaker's Lodge.onHit: 4d10 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Peacemaker's Lodge.effect: The blast creates a zone of tranquility until the end of your next turn. Creatures within the zone take a penalty to attack rolls equal to your Constitution modifier. Your allies don’t take this penalty while adjacent to your spirit companion.

Heart of Bedlam.name: Heart of Bedlam
Heart of Bedlam.flavor: All around you, confusion reigns as you redirect creatures’ instinctual urges of violence toward opponents of your choosing.
Heart of Bedlam.effect: As the first action of each of your turns until the end of the encounter, you can use a free action to cause one creature within 2 squares of your spirit companion to make a basic attack as a free action against another creature of your choice.

Call Spirit Companion.name: Call Spirit Companion
Call Spirit Companion.flavor: Your soul reaches out to your spirit friend, which faithfully appears at your side.
Call Spirit Companion.requirement: Your spirit companion must not be present.
Call Spirit Companion.effect:
You conjure your spirit companion in an unoccupied square in the burst. The spirit lasts until you fall unconscious or until you dismiss it as a minor action. The spirit occupies 1 square. Enemies cannot move through its space, but allies can. When you take a move action, you can also move the spirit a number of squares equal to your speed.
    The spirit can be targeted by melee or ranged attacks, although it lacks hit points. If a single melee or ranged attack deals damage to the spirit equal to 10 + one-half your level or higher, the spirit disappears, and you take damage equal to 5 + one-half your level. Otherwise, the spirit is unaffected by the attack.

Protecting Strike.name: Protecting Strike
Protecting Strike.flavor: Roaring echoes from ancient caves and hollows accompany your spirit companion’s attack, infusing your allies with vitality.
Protecting Strike.onHit:
1d8 + Wisdom modifier damage, and each ally adjacent to your spirit companion gains temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier.
Level 21: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier damage.

Fate Weaver's Shield.name: Fate Weaver's Shield
Fate Weaver's Shield.flavor: You call on the spirit of the great spider known as the Fate Weaver to craft a web of protection around an ally.
Fate Weaver's Shield.effect: The target gains a +5 bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn or until it attacks.

Sacrificial Spirit.name: Sacrificial Spirit
Sacrificial Spirit.flavor: You temporarily sap your spirit companion of its strength, transferring its power to bolster the life force of an ally.
Sacrificial Spirit.effect: Each ally adjacent to your spirit companion regains a healing surge, and your spirit companion is immediately dismissed and cannot be conjured again until the start of your next turn.

Faces of the Fallen.name: Faces of the Fallen
Faces of the Fallen.flavor: Each of your enemies sees the faces of fallen allies flicker across the visage of your spirit companion.
Faces of the Fallen.effect: Until the end of the encounter, an enemy that starts its turn adjacent to your spirit companion is weakened until the start of its next turn.

Guardians of Howling Wrath.name: Guardians of Howling Wrath
Guardians of Howling Wrath.flavor: Your spirit transforms into a howling echo of death itself, assaults your enemies, consumes their life force, and channels it into primal power.
Guardians of Howling Wrath.effect: Until the end of the encounter, any time an enemy within 2 squares of your spirit companion is reduced to 0 hit points or fewer, you gain a +2 power bonus on attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Life and Death Struggle.name: Life and Death Struggle
Life and Death Struggle.flavor: You anchor your allies’ souls to their bodies, keeping them from shuffling off the mortal coil for a short while.
Life and Death Struggle.effect: Each ally within the burst can spend a healing surge. This burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of the encounter. While within the zone, you and your allies gain a +5 power bonus to death saves. Enemies within the zone cannot heal or regenerate.

Spirit's Prey.name: Spirit's Prey
Spirit's Prey.flavor: Your spirit companion lashes out at a moving foe, and an ally uses the distraction to fire on that enemy.
Spirit's Prey.trigger: An enemy leaves a square adjacent to your spirit companion without shifting
Spirit's Prey.effect: One ally within 10 squares of your spirit companion can make a ranged basic attack against the target as a free action with combat advantage.

World Speaker's Command.name: World Speaker's Command
World Speaker's Command.flavor: The voices and growls of primal spirits cascade on your foe, stopping it in its tracks.
World Speaker's Command.trigger: An enemy leaves a square adjacent to your spirit companion without shifting
World Speaker's Command.onHit: The target stops moving and must use a different action to resume moving.

Claws of the Eagle.name: Claws of the Eagle
Claws of the Eagle.flavor: Your spirit companion swoops down on your foe, causing it to neglect its defenses for a short time.
Claws of the Eagle.effect: One ally adjacent to your spirit companion or within 3 squares of you can make a basic attack against the target. If the ally’s attack hits, the target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

Spirit of the Tempest.name: Spirit of the Tempest
Spirit of the Tempest.flavor: You draw on the strength of your spirit companion, channeling a storm of primal power to attack your foe and aid an ally.
Spirit of the Tempest.onHit:
1d8 + Wisdom modifier thunder damage.
Level 21: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier thunder damage.
Spirit of the Tempest.effect: One ally within 2 squares of either you or your spirit companion can make a saving throw.

Voice of Battle.name: Voice of Battle
Voice of Battle.flavor: You voice a battle cry through your spirit companion, which hammers into your enemy and spurs an ally into motion.
Voice of Battle.onHit:
1d6 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage.
Level 21: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage.
Voice of Battle.effect: One ally within 2 squares of your spirit companion can shift 2 squares as a free action.

Ironbreaker Claws.name: Ironbreaker Claws
Ironbreaker Claws.flavor: Your spirit companion sinks its claws into your foe, twisting the enemy off balance and leaving it open to an ally’s attack.
Ironbreaker Claws.onHit: 1d10 + Wisdom modifier damage. An ally adjacent to the target can make a melee basic attack against it as a free action.
Ironbreaker Claws.stalkerSpirit: The ally gains a bonus to the attack roll equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Stormhawk's Fury.name: Stormhawk's Fury
Stormhawk's Fury.flavor: Your spirit companion dives on your enemy and unleashes a bolt of lightning, which lingers momentarily.
Stormhawk's Fury.effect: Before the attack, you can move your spirit companion 3 squares.
Stormhawk's Fury.watcherSpirit: The number of squares you can move your spirit companion equals 2 + your Dexterity modifier.
Stormhawk's Fury.onHit: 1d8 + Wisdom modifier lightning damage. Until the end of your next turn, when any ally hits an enemy adjacent to your spirit companion, that enemy takes extra lightning damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.

Great Watcher Spirit.name: Great Watcher Spirit
Great Watcher Spirit.flavor: The spirit of the Great Watcher shows the path to victory, pointing out flaws in your enemy’s defenses while shoring up your comrades’ weaknesses.
Great Watcher Spirit.target: One or two allies in the burst
Great Watcher Spirit.effect: Each target can make a basic attack as a free action. Until the end of the encounter, any ally adjacent to your spirit companion doesn’t grant combat advantage.

Spirit of Grief's Shadow.name: Spirit of Grief's Shadow
Spirit of Grief's Shadow.flavor: You unleash a spirit of death, misery, and famine on your foe, leaving it weak and listless.
Spirit of Grief's Shadow.onHit: The target is dazed and slowed and takes ongoing 5 psychic damage (save ends all).
Spirit of Grief's Shadow.onMiss: The target is dazed until the end of your next turn, and it is slowed (save ends).
Spirit of Grief's Shadow.effect: Until the end of the encounter, the target takes a –5 penalty to saving throws while adjacent to your spirit companion.

Stone Root Spirit.name: Stone Root Spirit
Stone Root Spirit.flavor: The earth rises at your command, scattering your enemies and creating a bastion for you and your allies.
Stone Root Spirit.onHit: You slide the target 2 squares to a square outside the burst and knock the target prone.
Stone Root Spirit.effect: The burst creates a zone of protective earth that lasts until the end of the encounter. The zone is difficult terrain for your enemies. You and your allies gain cover while within the zone.

Engaging Pursuit.name: Engaging Pursuit
Engaging Pursuit.flavor: Your spirit companion follows your enemies closely, preventing them from escaping your wrath.
Engaging Pursuit.trigger: An enemy that started its turn adjacent to your spirit companion ends its movement no longer adjacent to your spirit companion
Engaging Pursuit.effect: You move your spirit companion to a square adjacent to the triggering enemy.

Protective Roots.name: Protective Roots
Protective Roots.flavor: Thin roots extend from your spirit companion to clothe you and your friends in a protective layer.
Protective Roots.target: You and each ally in the burst
Protective Roots.effect: Each target gains resistance to all damage equal to your Constitution modifier until the end of the encounter.

Spirit of the Great Cat.name: Spirit of the Great Cat
Spirit of the Great Cat.flavor: The spirit of a magnificent cat overshadows you, lending you and your allies its grace.
Spirit of the Great Cat.effect: Until the end of the encounter, allies within 3 squares of you can stand up as a minor action, and when any ally within 3 squares of you shifts, that ally can shift 1 extra square.

Spirit Zephyr.name: Spirit Zephyr
Spirit Zephyr.flavor: A gentle wind blows around your spirit companion and enhances your allies’ ranged attacks.
Spirit Zephyr.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you and your allies gain a +1 power bonus to ranged attack rolls against enemies adjacent to your spirit companion. In addition, as a free action you can end this power’s effect to grant one ally within 10 squares of you a +2 bonus to ranged attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Stormhawk Vigilance.name: Stormhawk Vigilance
Stormhawk Vigilance.flavor: As your foes leap to attack, the spirit of Stormhawk lends quickness to your allies as they prepare for the assault.
Stormhawk Vigilance.trigger: You roll initiative at the beginning of an encounter
Stormhawk Vigilance.target: You and each ally in the burst
Stormhawk Vigilance.effect: You slide each target 3 squares. Each target can draw a weapon or an implement as a free action.

Sly Fox Spirit.name: Sly Fox Spirit
Sly Fox Spirit.flavor: Your spirit companion transforms into a cunning fox spirit and distracts your enemies, allowing your friends to attack.
Sly Fox Spirit.effect: The target can make a basic attack as a free action. If that attack hits, a second ally adjacent to your spirit companion can make a basic attack as a free action.

Spirit of Slavering Bloodlust.name: Spirit of Slavering Bloodlust
Spirit of Slavering Bloodlust.flavor: Your spirit companion slavers at the scent of blood, and its feral frenzy spreads to your allies.
Spirit of Slavering Bloodlust.attack: Wisdom vs. Fortitude. If the target is bloodied, you gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll.
Spirit of Slavering Bloodlust.onHit: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, any ally adjacent to your spirit companion gains a +2 power bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls against bloodied creatures.
Spirit of Slavering Bloodlust.watcherSpirit: The bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls equals your Dexterity modifier.

Steadfast Mountain Guardian.name: Steadfast Mountain Guardian
Steadfast Mountain Guardian.flavor: Your spirit companion becomes a creature of rock and earth, providing you and your allies with a protective barrier.
Steadfast Mountain Guardian.onHit: 1d10 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is pushed 2 squares.
Steadfast Mountain Guardian.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you and your allies gain a +1 power bonus to all defenses while adjacent to your spirit companion.
Steadfast Mountain Guardian.worldSpeakerSpirit: The power bonus to all defenses equals your Constitution modifier.

Coils of the World Serpent.name: Coils of the World Serpent
Coils of the World Serpent.flavor: The earth trembles, and a distant roar rumbles across the battlefield as the World Serpent manifests.
Coils of the World Serpent.effect: The burst creates a zone of spectral coils that lasts until the end of the encounter. When any enemy hits an ally who is within the zone, that enemy takes damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Spirit of Battle's End.name: Spirit of Battle's End
Spirit of Battle's End.flavor: Your spirit companion tears into your enemy, promising a swift end.
Spirit of Battle's End.effect: When any ally misses the target with a melee attack, the target takes 5 damage and makes a saving throw. If that saving throw is successful, this effect ends. Otherwise, it lasts until the end of the encounter.

Vengeful Blood Spirits.name: Vengeful Blood Spirits
Vengeful Blood Spirits.flavor: You fill your allies with the power of the blood spirits—primal entities that thirst for violence, blood, and vengeance.
Vengeful Blood Spirits.effect: Each target can charge as a free action and deals 1d10 extra damage if the charge attack hits. In addition, until the end of the encounter, each target gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls when charging.

Everlasting Flame's Strength.name: Everlasting Flame's Strength
Everlasting Flame's Strength.flavor: You lend your ally the aid of a fire spirit, which burns more brightly as that ally defeats your enemies.
Everlasting Flame's Strength.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever the target reduces an enemy to 0 hit points, he or she regains 5 hit points, and each enemy adjacent to him or her takes 2 fire damage.

Hearth Spirit.name: Hearth Spirit
Hearth Spirit.flavor: A comforting hearth spirit settles over you, soothing you and your allies.
Hearth Spirit.effect: Each target regains 1d6 hit points. Until the end of your next turn, you and your allies can use your second winds as a minor action while adjacent to your spirit companion.

Spirit Companion's Shelter.name: Spirit Companion's Shelter
Spirit Companion's Shelter.flavor: You create a shield of primal energy to protect your spirit companion.
Spirit Companion's Shelter.trigger: An enemy hits your spirit companion
Spirit Companion's Shelter.effect: Your spirit companion gains a +4 bonus to the defense targeted by the attack.

Spirit of Vengeance.name: Spirit of Vengeance
Spirit of Vengeance.flavor: As your foe strikes you down, you unleash your reserve of spiritual energy to invigorate your allies.
Spirit of Vengeance.trigger: An enemy reduces you to 0 hit points or fewer
Spirit of Vengeance.effect: Each target can spend a healing surge. In addition, until the end of your next turn, each target gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls against the triggering enemy.

Guardian Eagle Flock.name: Guardian Eagle Flock
Guardian Eagle Flock.flavor: Your spirit companion changes into a flock of hunting eagles that swoop overhead, using their talons to create openings for your allies and to drive your enemies away.
Guardian Eagle Flock.effect: If you hit at least one target, you slide each ally in the burst 3 squares.

Hammer of the Grasping Tides.name: Hammer of the Grasping Tides
Hammer of the Grasping Tides.flavor: Your spirit companion transforms into a thrashing tide—a tidal wave to your foes and a guiding current to your allies.
Hammer of the Grasping Tides.onHit: 1d8 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
Hammer of the Grasping Tides.effect: Each ally in the burst gains a +3 bonus to speed until the end of your next turn.
Hammer of the Grasping Tides.worldSpeakerSpirit: Until the end of your next turn, each ally in the burst gains a bonus to all defenses against opportunity attacks equal to 2 + your Constitution modifier.

Spirit of Weakness.name: Spirit of Weakness
Spirit of Weakness.flavor: Your spirit companion carves a crimson rune in the flesh of your enemy, weakening that foe and leaving it vulnerable to an ally’s strike.
Spirit of Weakness.onHit: The target is weakened until the end of your next turn. An ally adjacent to the target can make a melee basic attack against it as a free action with combat advantage.
Spirit of Weakness.stalkerSpirit: The ally gains a bonus to the damage roll equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Call Discordant Spirit.name: Call Discordant Spirit
Call Discordant Spirit.flavor: You force a disagreeable spirit to bind itself to your enemy briefly, creating such discordance within the enemy that its companions lose their concentration.
Call Discordant Spirit.onHit: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage. Until the end of the encounter, each enemy other than the target takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls and saving throws while within 5 squares of it.

Explosive Sacrifice.name: Explosive Sacrifice
Explosive Sacrifice.flavor: Your spirit companion sacrifices itself in an explosion of energy, which tears into nearby creatures.
Explosive Sacrifice.onHit: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).
Explosive Sacrifice.effect: Your spirit companion disappears, and you can’t call it back until after the end of your next turn.

Spirit Control.name: Spirit Control
Spirit Control.flavor: You open a rift of flaring spiritual energy that blasts your enemies, strengthens your spirit companion, and enhances your ability to call on the spirits.
Spirit Control.onHit: 1d10 + Wisdom modifier damage. Your spirit companion gains a +2 power bonus to attack rolls against the target until the end of the encounter.
Spirit Control.effect: The blast creates a zone of flaring energy that lasts until the end of the encounter. While your spirit companion is within the zone, your spirit powers gain a bonus to damage rolls equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Spirit of Earth Arisen.name: Spirit of Earth Arisen
Spirit of Earth Arisen.flavor: A spirit of soil and rock erupts from the ground under your foe. Its presence rallies your allies, who are invigorated by the spirit with each strike.
Spirit of Earth Arisen.effect: You conjure a spirit of the land in an unoccupied square adjacent to the target. The spirit lasts until the end of your next turn. The spirit occupies 1 square. Each square within 2 squares of the spirit is difficult terrain for your enemies. When any ally in those squares hits an enemy, that ally regains 5 hit points. An ally can regain hit points in this way once per round. As a move action, you can move the spirit 5 squares. When the spirit appears, it makes the following attack against the target.

Shield of the Immortal Forest.name: Shield of the Immortal Forest
